text: is a Japanese castle in Yonezawa city in Yamagata Prefecture. It is a flatland-style castle, and was the residence of the Uesugi clan, who were the daimy≈ç, or feudal lords, of Yonezawa Domain during the Edo period. == References == * * * * * * == Other websites == * Yonezawa Castle Jcastle Profile Category:Castles in Japan Category:13th-century buildings and structures Category:Yamagata Prefecture
title: Yonezawa Castle
